rows.label: bf05210100_0010
rows.name: Meleph-san, may I ask you something?

rows.label: bf05210100_0020
rows.name: Go ahead.

rows.label: bf05210100_0030
rows.name: Rex awakened Hikari-chan.

rows.label: bf05210100_0040
rows.name: He understands what that means.

rows.label: bf05210100_0050
rows.name: I suppose so...

rows.label: bf05210100_0060
rows.name: And yet you didn't try to capture us.

rows.label: bf05210100_0070
rows.name: Why is that?

rows.label: bf05210100_0080
rows.name: Because of Hero Adel.

rows.label: bf05210100_0100
rows.name: 500 years ago...

rows.label: bf05210100_0110
rows.name:
He became this great hero,
who we celebrate even today.

rows.label: bf05210100_0120
rows.name: But I know him only through legends.

rows.label: bf05210100_0130
rows.name:
I want to see with my own eyes 
what that hero and Blade will bring about...

rows.label: bf05210100_0140
rows.name: That's about it, I guess.

rows.label: bf05210100_0150
rows.name: I'm not Adel, you know?

rows.label: bf05210100_0160
rows.name: But you are the Holy Grail's Driver.

rows.label: bf05210100_0170
rows.name:
The second you're under imperial control,
you won't be that hero anymore.

rows.label: bf05210100_0180
rows.name: Hmm, I don't really get it.

rows.label: bf05210100_0190
rows.name: Those with great power should be free...

rows.label: bf05210100_0200
rows.name: Is that what you mean?

rows.label: bf05210100_0210
rows.name:
Not quite right, but not far off either.
You can think of it that way if you like.

rows.label: bf05210100_0220
rows.name: The Flamebringer sure has a difficult personality.

rows.label: bf05210100_0230
rows.name: Why don't you try being more honest?

rows.label: bf05210100_0240
rows.name: Mind your own business...

rows.label: bf05210100_0250
rows.name:
Beyond this gate is the inner wall of the Holy See.
Here you will find the main administrative facilities.

rows.label: bf05210100_0260
rows.name: Now then, I'll guide you to your lodging.
